DOC.brief_summary: This study aim compare effect local wound infiltration ketamine versus dexmedetomidine add bupivacaine stress response postoperative pain lower abdominal cancer surgery .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Wound Infiltration Ketamine Versus Dexmedetomidine Added Bupivacaine Surgical Stress
DOC.detailed_description: Patients randomly assign use online research randomizer three group , 30 patient group : Group C : 30 patient receive local anesthetic wound infiltration 20 ml bupivacaine 0.5 % dilute 20 ml saline ( total volume 40 ml ) two divided dos i.e . 20 ml administer side incision ( control group ) . Group K : 30 patient receive local anesthetic wound infiltration 20 ml bupivacaine 0.5 % dilute 20 ml saline +1 mg /kg ketamine ( total volume 40 ml ) two divided dos i.e . 20 ml administer side incision . Group D : 30 patient receive local anesthetic wound infiltration 20 ml bupivacaine 0.5 % dilute 20 ml saline + 1Âµg/kg dexmedetomidine ( total volume 40 ml ) two divided dos i.e . 20 ml administer side incision .
